This will enable him to prepare food for sale in the hotel in a good clean place. This is his fifth loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy tiles, sinks and other materials to upgrade his restaurant kitchen

loans.name: Ileana Patricia

texts.es: Ileana es una mujer emprendedora con mucho éxito es casada, con dos hijos tiene 45 años de edad desde hace 18 años se dedica a tener un pequeño taller de costura, ella misma atiende su negocio y sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de su localidad, el crédito lo solicita para compra de materia prima como telas, hilos, gruesa de zipper, entretelas, ya que le demandan más producción y  nuevos clientes que acorto plazo contratara personal para involucrarse en el proceso productivo.
texts.en:
Ileana, 45, is a successful female entrepreneurial. She is married and has two children. For 18 years she has run a small sewing workshop. She works in her business and sells her products in the local market. 

The loan she is asking for will buy raw materials such as fabrics, threads, zippers and interlining as she has increased demand and new clients. Soon she will need to hire staff to help her in the production process.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as fabrics, threads, zippers and interlining

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue his study by paying his semester fees.

loans.name: Sayeeda  Naseem

texts.en:
Sayeeda Naseem is 55 years old and married.  She has been successfully running a business of flower making for the past three years. 

She offers various colorful flowers for decorating homes and events like birthdays, parties, etc. She sells them to the people of her community and also supplies the local market.  She has good communication skills and has a good client list. She is motivated to provide for her family. 

She wants to grow her business so she has requested a loan of PKR 45,000 to buy raw materials, such as fabric, glace paper, and tissue paper, along with packs of paints in various colors. 

In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand of her customers consistently. She wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her family and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy raw material, such as fabric, glace paper, and tissue paper, along with packs of paints in various colors.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 66 years old from Nakuru. He is married to Lucy and they are blessed with four children aged 36, 29, 26 and 23 years old. He is a farmer and he has been operating this business for the last 30 years. He has applied for his first loan of 20,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya which will be using to buy maize planting seeds and fertilizer 

His monthly income right now is 8,000 KES and his plan is to use the anticipated profits realized from his expanded business to improve his farming activities and to pay his loan back to VisionFund Kenya. In the future, he hopes to be a very successful dairy farmer in his area

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and maize seeds

loans.name: Tabassum

texts.en: Tabassum is a 44-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo). They make a good amount to cover their household expenditures. They have maintained many regular customers. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow the family business so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at their store. She hopes to increase their sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Baraa

texts.en: Baraa is 23 years old. She lives in a rented house in a section of Jordan called Salt with her husband. Her husband has a fruit and vegetable store. Baraa is studying for a Bachelors’ degree with a major in Computer Information Systems. She is in her fourth year. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn a better income in order to help her husband. Baraa was unable to pay for her upcoming semester fees because of the financial crisis that her husband has been facing. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Graciliano

texts.es: Graciliano, tiene 40 años de edad, es soltero, tiene dos hijos y vive en una aldea de Las Flores, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, lleva 10 años de cultivar café en una parcela que tiene. Esta producción es vendida a los intermediarios de la zona. Ha mantenido en buen estado a su finca mediante la inversión de varios prestamos, actualmente solicita 25,000 lempiras que también los invertirá en cultivar una nueva parcela y comprar fertilizantes para dar asistencia a sus cultivos. Su propósito es aumentar la producción y los ingresos para darle calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Graciliano, is 40 years old and single. He has two children and lives in the village of Las Flores, Lempira. 

He has always worked as a farmer and has been growing coffee for the past ten years on his plot of land.

His crops are sold to intermediaries in the area. He has maintained his plot in good standing with the investments from several loans. 

Currently he is requesting 25,000 Lempiras [$1,300]  to invest in cultivating a new plot and buy fertilizer to help his crops.

His goal is to increase production and income in order to give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Eldard

texts.en:
Eldad is married and with his wife they are blessed with seven children. He also has three dependants who are orphans. He hails from Katojo village, Rwakirungura Parish, Rukungiri District. He has applied for a loan of 1,500,000 UGX. He started a business in 2005 so that he would be able to earn income to take care of his family needs.

Eldad is a very hard working and honest man. However, his main challenges have been insufficient capital and fluctuations in agricultural prices. With this loan from UGAFODE Microfinance Limited (MDI), Eldad is going to buy more farm and agriculture inputs in order to boost produce production. This will help him realize more profits which will improve his livelihood.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: La Confianza Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cinco socias emprendedoras una de ella es Concepción mujer de 47 años, soltera con cuatro hijos, su negocio es una floristería,  compra y  vende cosechas de tamarindo actividad que viene realizando durante diez años, de ser cliente tiene 2 años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de oasis, helechos, plasma, rosas rojas, rosas blancas, girasoles, margaritas, marco de madera, cinta de mantequilla etc. Mercedes tiene 54 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tamales pisques, Dora tiene 27 años de edad y  su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio, Esperanza tiene 52 años y su negocio es la compra y venta frutas y Margarita tiene 50 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tamales pisques.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five enterprising members. 

One of them is Concepción. A 47 year old single woman with four children. 

She owns a flower shop. For the past ten years she has bought and sold tamarind crops. 

She has been a client for 2 years. She will use the loan to buy ferns, plasmas, red roses, white roses, sunflowers, daises, wooden frames, decorative ribbons etc. 

Mercedes is 54 and she sells "tamales pisques" [tamales made with bean filling]. 

Dora is 27 and she has a small grocery store in her home.

Esperanza is 52 and she buys and sells fruit. 

Margarita is 50 and has a business selling tamales.

loans.use: to buy ferns, plasmas, red roses, white roses, sunflowers, daises, wooden frames, decorative ribbons etc.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
From Nakuru, John is 45 years old, married to Lucy, and the father of five children aged 21, 19, 16,  3 and 1 year. A farmer for the last 15 years, he has a monthly income of KES. 7,000

John has requested his first loan of KES. 20,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy maize, planting seeds and fertilizer, and to pay farm laborers. His plan is to use the anticipated profits realized from his expanded business to improve his farming activities and repay his loan.

In the future, John hopes to be a very successful dairy farmer in his area.

loans.use: To hire laborers to prepare his land for the next planting season and to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting.

loans.name: Michael Antonio

texts.es: El joven Michael, a sus 30 años es casado padre de una hija pequeña, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe, su esposa le apoya con los gastos del hogar ya que vende Sandalias para dama, el por su parte labora como Gerente de Bar en un restaurante, desde hace un año, el credito lo esta solicitando para la compra de materiales de Construccion, Bloques, cemento, arena, hiero, ceramica para completar las modificaciones de la vivienda, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic le esta brindando atraves de Fondos Kiva.
texts.en:
Michael, 30, is married and has a small daughter. He lives in the municipality of  Ticuantepe. 

His wife helps him with the household expenses by selling women's sandals. 

He works as the manager of a bar in a restaurant. He has had this job for a year. 

He is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, sand, iron and ceramic in order to finish renovations in his house. 

He appreciates the help Afodenic is giving him through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy materials

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es:
José Jaime tiene 24 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad con paisajes verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, una bebida tradicional de la sierra del Perú, que se utiliza para fechas festivas y lo comercializa en los distritos aledaños a su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 501 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de caña de azúcar, materia prima del proceso de destilación y de esta manera ofrecer en mayor cantidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
José Jaime is 24 years old and lives with his wife and children in the District of Callayuc. This community has green pastures and is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Jaén Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

José distills aguardiente, a traditional beverage of the mountainous areas of Peru. It is served during festivals and distributed in the surrounding areas of his community. José is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,501 PEN so that he can buy a large quantity of sugar cane, one of the main ingredients used in the distillation process. This will allow him to offer his product in larger quantities to his customers.

loans.use: to buy sugar cane in bulk for distilling aguardiente.

loans.name: Mirardo

texts.es: El señor Mirardo sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de condimentos como ají y cominos cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de una moledora industrial y incremento su ingreso, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de condimentos al por mayor ya que recién abrirá una tienda y necesita surtirla de productos,  se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le dan para crecer en su negocio, mejorar su calidad de vida ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en:
For his second loan through Kiva, Mirardo is carrying on with the same job of selling condiments such as pepper and cumin. 

His previous loan went well, as he bought an industrial grinder and expanded his income. This time he is asking for a loan to buy wholesale condiments as he will soon open a shop, and he needs to stock it with products. He feels happy and grateful for the opportunity they are giving to him to expand his business and improve his quality of life, as this is the only job that lets him support himself.

loans.use: to buy sacks of spices like pepper and cumin in order to open a shop

loans.name: Nawab

texts.en:
Nawab is 56 years old and married.  She has been running a business of buying and selling animals for many years. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and sells them out near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslims countries). 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf foundation.  Currently she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase four more baby goats. She is in her third loan cycle with good repayment history.  

She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase four more baby goats.

loans.name: Rawan

texts.en:
Rawan is 22 years old. She lives in a section of Jordan called Mafraq with her husband and only daughter. Her husband is serving in the military. 

Rawan is studying for a bachelor's degree with a major in child raising. She is in her fourth year. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn a better income in order to support her husband in covering her daughter's needs. 

But because of the financial crisis that her husband has been facing, she was not able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Reynaldo Guillermo

texts.es: El joven Reynaldo tiene 22 años y es Soltero,  estudia la carrera  de Ingeniería Electromecánica en una de las universidades reconocidas  de  la Ciudad de La Paz,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios El joven Reynaldo trabaja como chofer en sus horarios libres, el taxi es de su papa de es de ahí que tiene un ingreso extra,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y Reynaldo va a usar este préstamo para  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar cómo libros para su área,  para terminar sus estudios falta el tiempo 3 años,  Reynaldo enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse al 100% a su estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere ejercer su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Reynaldo, 22, is single and is studying for a degree in electromechanical engineering in a well-known university in the city of La Paz.  He is working to pay for his education. Reynaldo works as a driver in his free time, using his father's taxi; this is how he generates some extra income. This is his first loan with the institution.  Reynaldo will use this loan to cover the various costs of being a student, such as for books in his discipline.  He has 3 more years to go to get his degree. 

Reynaldo faces challenges in his studies, such as the fact that he must work and so cannot study 100 percent of the time.  However, he has the desire to continue and move forward.  When he finishes his degree, he wants to work in his profession so that he can improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy books

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various grains, sodas, juices, basic staples, scented soaps, and laundry detergent.

loans.name: Pragati Shg Group

texts.en:
Mukta is a 27-year-old lady currently engaged in selling goats and goat milk. Currently, she has 15 goats. From this activity, she is able to make 4,000 INR per month. She, along with the other 10 women from her village, created a Self Help group named "Pragati Shg" and Mukta is the President of this group. In the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised is Mukta.

The group is made up of members having the purpose of helping and supporting each other in their business activities and in their personal lives. All the group members are engaged in different activities like selling cow's milk, selling flowers, selling vegetables, etc.

Mukta lives with her parents-in-law, husband and her two children. Her husband is a daily laborer and sometimes he helps in Mukta's business activities. Mukta and her husband both take on all the family's responsibilities. Mukta has a dream of making a house for her family and educating her children. Mukta, along with her group members, has requested a loan of 165,000 INR. Mukta will use her portion to purchase more goat kids for her animal raising business. She is really very thankful to Kiva for this opportunity.

loans.use: To purchase more goat kids

loans.name: Roger Efrain

texts.es: El señor  Roger tiene 32 años, el se dedica  a  la crianza de ganado para su posterior venta, el vive en la localidad de Batallas, este préstamo es primero que tiene con la institución, el señor  Roger va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado mejorado, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar sus ingresos, el señor  Roger enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, el señor  Roger va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos y también comprar forraje para su ganado, el señor  Roger desea para su negocio crecer en la crianza y venta de ganado, el es una persona muy  trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Roger is 32 years old and he raises cattle to later sell them. He lives in Batallas. This is his first loan with the institution. Roger will use the loan to buy a higher quality cow so that he can increase his income. Roger's challenges are to improve his business and his quality of living. Roger will use the loan to improve his revenues and also to buy fodder for his cattle. Roger wants his business to expand raising and selling cattle. He is a hard-working and enterprising person who wants to get ahead and improve his life.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: La Realidad Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores una de ellas es Marlín mujer de 30 años de edad, casada con tres hijos, su negocio es la de una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace tres años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución un año, ella misma atiende su negocio el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite en bidón, carne de res, carne de pollo, productos lácteos, medicamentos populares, jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de baño, queso, sardinas, salsa naturas, sopas maggi etc. Juan tiene 53 años y su negocio es la venta de tamales, Nubia tiene 62 años y su negocio es la hecha y venta de nacatamales y Jose tiene 48 años de edad y su  negocio es la venta de tamales pisques.
texts.en:
This communal bank is made up of 4 enterprising members.  One of these is Marlin, a 30 year-old woman.  She is married and has 3 children.  She has a grocery store business that she's been running from her home for 3 years.  She's been a member of the institution for a year.  She manages the business herself, and will invest this loan in the purchase of rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil in drums, beef, chicken meat, dairy products, over-the-counter medications, soap to wash clothes, bath soap, cheese, sardines, Naturas brand sauces, Maggi brand soups, etc.  

Juan, 53, has a business selling tamales.  Nubia, 62, makes and sells nacatamales (steamed corncakes filled with meat or other ingredients), and Jose, 48, has a business selling "pisque" tamales (tamales made with bean filling).

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Gulumkan

texts.ru: Гулумкан 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Гулумкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулумкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулумкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулумкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку жеребят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового помещения для скота.
texts.en: Gulumkan is 54 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Gulumkan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Gulumkan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 21 years ago, with an initial purchase of livestock in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulumkan's hard work, she currently has 2 horses on her farm. Her monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Gulumkan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy foals to increase the size of her herd. Gulumkan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to build a new barn for her livestock.

loans.use: to buy foals.

loans.name: Sector Martinez Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socios una de ellas es Hayssell tiene 26 años de edad  acompañada desde hace 8 meses que se dedica a vender ropa nueva anteriormente era ama de casa, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de blusas de damas, pantalón de varón Texas, pantalón de mujer Holyster,etc. Jonathan tiene 25 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa y calzado, Julia tiene 55 años de edad y su negocio es la de un taller de costura y Mirna tiene 50 años y su negocio es el destace de cerdo.
texts.en: This group has four members one of which is Hayssell. She is 26 years old,and in a common-law relationship. For the past 8 months she has been selling new clothing. Before that she was a housewife. Hayssell will use the loan to blouses, men's jeans and women's Hollister brand jeans. Jonathon is 25 years old and he sells clothing and footwear. Julia is 55 years old and she is a seamstress. Mirna is 50 years old and she butchers pigs.

loans.use: to buy clothing like blouses, men's pants, woman's pants etc.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is 22 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with his family which consists of six members. Ali is studying for his Bachelors. He was majoring in Mechanical Design. Then he changed his major to become in Earth Sciences. He is in his third year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn better income in order to support his family. But because of the financial crisis that his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay his semester fees

loans.name: Nursuluu

texts.ru: Нурсулуу 52 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 ребенка. У Нурсулуу - среднее образование, она пенсионерка. Вместе с супругом Асанбеком в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимаются животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад,  с покупки скота на 17,000 сом KGS. Хозяйство процветает и умножается по сей день. Благодаря упорному труду Нурсулуу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 бычок, 20 овец, также имеется земельная доля в размере 2,40 ГА орошаемой земли, где ежегодно выращивают фасоль. Супруг Нурсулуу также в сезон подрабатывает на стройках частным строителем. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нурсулуу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Нурсулуу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на частичный ремонт помещения для скота.
texts.en: Nursuluu is 52 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising one child. Nursuluu has a secondary education. She is a pensioner. As the main source of income for her family, Nursuluu, along with her husband Asanbek, practices livestock breeding and crop farming.  She started this business 14 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 17,000 som (KGS). The farm is flourishing and abundant to this day. Thanks to Nursuluu's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow, 1 bull and 20 sheep on her farm, as well as a 2.40 hectare plot of irrigated land on which she grows beans every year. Nursuluu's husband earns extra money seasonally as a private builder on construction sites. Their monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Nursuluu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy bull calves to increase the size of her herd. Nursuluu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to make minor repairs on her cattle barn.

loans.use: to buy bull calves.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en: Sajida is a 32 year old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate healthier source of income. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en: Khursheed, age 45, deals in the business of animal sales with the support of her husband. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then her husband sells them out in the market at higher prices.  She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 35,000 to purchase two more calves. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Don Francisco, tiene 59 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. El trabajo por varios años en una empresa privada y hace dos años estableció su propio taller de carpintería donde elabora cuadros decorativos, tablas de picar decorativas, lámparas, cortineros, retrateras decoradas, todo en madera. El taller lo tiene en su casa y vende por encargos y en el mercado local. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 15,000 lempiras para comprar materia prima como madera, lijas, pegamento, pinturas, etc. para elaborar cuadros, lámparas, tablas de picar, cortineros todo decorado y poder cumplir con los pedidos. Su meta es terminar de graduar a sus hijos y poner el negocio en un local mas grande.
texts.en:
Francisco, 59, is married and has 2 children.  He lives in the municipality of Choloma, in Cortes, Honduras.  For a number of years he worked for a private company.  Two years ago, he set up his own carpentry workshop where he makes decorative wall hangings, decorative cutting boards, lamps, curtain rods, and decorative picture frames, all from wood.  He has his workshop in his home, and he sells through orders and also in the local market.  

Francisco has requested a loan of 15,000 Honduran lempiras to buy raw materials such as wood, sandpaper, glue, paints, etc. to make his decorative wall hangings, lamps, cutting boards, and curtain rods.  This way he can fill his orders.  His goal is to educate his children and set up his business in a larger space.

loans.use: to buy raw material for his wood craft business

loans.name: Shahmeem

texts.en: Shahmeem, age 40, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase two more calves. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Guineales Group

texts.es:
Sara (primera de derecha a izquierda en la  fotografía) es una señorita de 22 años de edad, soltera, vive junto a su familia en Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, Sololá.
Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de banano, lo cual lo realiza en la comunidad donde vive; esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres, quienes se dedicaban a lo mismo desde muchos años atrás. Esta labor le genera a ella los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento familiar. Ella comenta que le gusta esta actividad porque es honesta y la ayuda a sentirse útil a su comunidad. Realiza esta labor desde niña junto a sus padres desde hace más de 15 años.
Ella decidió organizar un grupo con el objetivo de ayudarse mutuamente con su compañeras y asi mejorar sus niveles de vida. Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de insumos (fertilizante y pago de mano de obra) para mantenimiento de las  plantaciones de banano.
Sara sueña con incrementar la extensión de sus plantaciones de banano y asi incrementar sus ingresos para poder construir dos casas en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Sara is a 22-year-old woman (shown in the photo standing in the first position, from right to left). She is single and lives with her family in Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, Sololá.

Sara produces and sells bananas in the community where she lives. She learned this trade from her parents, who have been doing this type of work for many years. Sara works so that she can generate the needed income to sustain her family. She says that she enjoys the work because it is an honest way to earn a living and it makes her feel useful to her community. Sara has been doing this type of work since was a girl. She and her parents have been working for more than 15 years.

Sara decided to organize a group so that she and the other members could help one another improve their standard of living. She will use the loan to buy supplies (fertilizer) and pay for labor so that she can maintain her banana plants. Sara dreams of increasing her banana plots so that she can earn more income to build two houses in the near future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 39 year old man who hails from Rwenyerere village, Bugangari sub-county, Rukungiri district. He has applied for a loan of UGX 1,500,000.
He is a hard working man who owns a coffee plantation where he gets income for taking care of the needs of his family. However, his main challenge has been insufficient capital for adding in his business.
His dream is to expand his business and produce on a large scale and therefore is hopeful that with this loan from UGAFODE Microfinance Limited (MDI), his business is gonna grow steadily and his income will increase. He is hard working and thanks UGAFODE for the great service they are doing to the community.

loans.use: To buy produce

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина в разводе. У нее есть взрослый сын. Валентина имеет свой бизнес.

На центральном рынке города Валентина торгует одеждой и другими промышленными товарами. Во время весеннего сезона она торгует семенами. Валентина имеет опыт работы более 18 лет. Она сознательная, открытая и доброжелательная.

Валентина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 7,000 гривен на закупку семян овощей и цветов, а также на закупку луковиц цветов. Кредит поможет увеличить ее доход.
texts.en:
Valentina is divorced. She has an grown-up son. Valentina has her own business.

In the central market of the city, Valentina sells clothing and other manufactured goods. During the Spring season, she sells seeds. Valentina has more than 18 years of work experience. She is a conscientious, straightforward and kind woman.

Valentina is requesting a loan in the amount of 7,000 hryvnia to buy vegetable and flower seeds as well as flower bulbs. The loan will help her increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and flower bulbs for sale.

loans.name: El Pozo Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias empresarias, Yajaira es una de ella tiene 35 años de edad, casada dos hijos, y su negocio es la venta de fritanga, atol, tamales pisques, tamales rellenos etc. esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 8 años, ella  misma atiende su negocio. El  crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como carne de cerdo, chicharrón, maíz por quintal, cabeza de cerdo, leña, molida, etc. María tiene 54 años de edad y su negocio es fábrica de artesanías, Cruz tiene 62 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de leña y hoja de chagüites para hacer nacatamales.
texts.en: This group is formed of three entrepreneurs. Yajaira is one. She is 35 years old, married and has two children. Her business is selling fritanga (traditional Nicaraguan food like rice and beans, etc.), atole (a hot corn based drink), tamales pisques (filled with beans), stuffed tamales, etc. She has been doing this for 8 years and she takes care of the business herself. The loan will be used to buy raw material like pork, pork cracklings, corn by the quintal, pig's brain, wood, ground meat etc. María is 54 years old and she makes handicrafts. Cruz is 62 years old and her business is selling wood and chagüites leaves to wrap nacatamales. (a Nicaraguan type of tamale)

loans.use: to buy raw material like pork, pork cracklings, corn by the quintal, pig's brain, wood, ground meat etc.

loans.name: Margarita Eudocia

texts.es:
Margarita Eudocia tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cuyes desde hace 3 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para la engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecer a un mayor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Margarita Eudocia is 53 years old and lives with her husband and children in the District of Oyotún. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Margarita has been selling guinea pigs for three years. Her business is located in her home. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN so that she can buy balanced feed for fattening her animals. This will enable her to offer the animals to her customers at a higher price.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Siloe Group

texts.es: Este grupo formado por tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Claudia tiene 36 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos y su negocio es el destace de cerdo, los comercializa en su comunidad y mercado de su localidad,  tiene dos trabajadoras que les paga este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cerdo en pie. Rafaela tiene 51 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de fritanga en su domicilio y Flora tiene 44 años de edad y su negocio es el destace de cerdo.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three successful members. One of them is Claudia. She is 36 years old and married, with three children. Her business is butchering pigs. She sells them in her community and in the local market. She has two workers whom she pays. She will invest this loan in the purchase of live pigs.

Rafaela is 51 years old, and her business is selling fried food in her home. Flora is 44 years old, and her business is butchering pigs.

loans.use: to purchase live pigs

loans.name: Prerana Shg Group

texts.en:
Prerana Self Help Group is a group consisting of twelve members, all of whom are women. These entrepreneurs are very humble, hardworking and responsible people with good manners and lots of enthusiasm to improve their lives. A few years back, they all were facing the same kind of situation of poverty, so they planned to start general stores where they can provide the basic household consumables to their customers.

One of them is Khristodani, who was selected as their president. In the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised is Khristodani. Khristodani is a 50-year-old lady living with her husband and her three children, two of whom are at their schooling, and one of whom is married. Her husband works as a labourer in a factory situated near her village. 

Khristodani runs a general store to help her husband financially. She sells rice, grains, lentils, edible oil, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc. in her shop. She has developed a very good relationship with her customers in the village. She likes the fact that she can cater to the needs of the people in her village.

She has a plan to make her shop bigger and keep multiple things in her shop to satisfy her customers. She also wants to purchase the items for her shop in bulk directly from the wholesalers, for which she has requested a loan for purchasing items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household consumables.

loans.use: to purchase items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household consumables.

loans.name: Manuela Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Manuela, habita en la comarca llamada Esquipula, casada madre de tres hijos quienes estan en edades escolares, su esposo trabaja como cadete de un taxi en la capital, ella es jefa de cocina de una empresa privada su mayor sueño es poder terminar de construir su vivienda, el credito lo solicita para la compra de materiales de construccion como, Hierro, cemento, arena, etc. asi podra realizar las mejorar en su casa, Agradece el apoyo que se le esta brindado con este credito.
texts.en: Manuela lives in a region called Esquipula. She is a married mother of three school-aged children. Her husband works as a taxi driver in the city. She is a kitchen manager for a private company. Her greatest dream is to be able to build her own home. She is applying for a loan to buy construction materials such as iron, cement, sand, etc so she can make improvements in her home. She is thankful for the support she has been given with this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Santi Shg Group

texts.en:
In 2011, twelve women from the small village of Koraput district stepped out, decided to build a secure future for their families and formed a group named "Santi Shg" Self Help Group. The members of Santi Self Help Group are all women from the district of Koraput in Odisha, India.

One of them is Milita, who was selected as their president. The lady standing with her hand raised in the picture is Milita. Milita is 36 years old and lives with her husband and her three children. Her husband is a farmer and has been involved in the activity of cultivation for a long time. 

She got the idea of doing vegetable cultivation from her husband, so she gathered some other women from her neighborhood and told them about her plan. They liked her idea and appreciated her. She took over the leadership of the group and started to cultivate vegetables and sell them in her village. Initially, she started growing only a few vegetables like potatoes, tomatoes and onions, but later on she grew bitter gourd, snake gourd, cucumbers, ladyfingers (okra) and brinjal (eggplant). She has a very good relationship with her customers, as the vegetables she sells are fresh.

Now she has a new idea to rent some more land for cultivation so that she can grow more vegetables on a larger scale. For this reason, she has requested a loan. She will use the loan to purchase pesticides, seeds and fertilizers, and to pay rent for additional land.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides, seeds and fertilizers, and to pay rent for additional land.

loans.name: Abigail Keila

texts.es: La señora Abigail tiene 23 años, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo, ella ofrece sus productos visitando distintas zonas y oficinas de la zona de Pampahasi donde vive, también los que la conocen le hacen pedidos,  este te préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la señora Abigail  va a usar este préstamo para compra de perfumes y joyas al por mayor y así surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su mercadería, la señora Abigail enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando  mercadería y así de esta manera genera más ingresos económicos, se siente feliz ya agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan para crecer en su actividad, mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Señora Abigail is 23 years old. She sells cosmetics by catalog. She offers her products by visiting different zones and offices in the Pampahasi zone where she lives. People who know her also place orders. This loan is her first one with this institution. Señora Abigail is going to use this loan to buy perfumes and jewelry wholesale and thus stock her business. Her reason for applying for this loan is to increase her merchandise. Señora Abigail faces challenges in her business, such as competition, and she is going to use the earnings to continue buying merchandise and in this way generate more income. She feels happy and grateful for the opportunity that they offer her to grow in her business and improve her income, and in the end, her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and jewelry

loans.name: Salomatoy

texts.ru:
Саломатой предприимчивая сельская женщина в возрасте 56 лет. Она живет в районе Джиликуль с мужем, тремя сыновьями, невесткой и двумя внуками. Ее муж и сыновья в сезон занимаются выращиванием бахчевых культур и земляного ореха. 
Саломатой в данный момент собирается начать свой торговый бизнес. Ее интересует купля-продажа тканей. Она планирует торговать тканями на рынках района, работающим по четвергам и воскресеньям. По причине того, что Саломатой не имеет достаточного начального капитала, она обратилась за кредитом. Она действительно нуждается в данном кредите. Начав данный бизнес Саломатой сможет обеспечить семью стабильным доходом, не зависящим от сезона. Она ждет поддержки.
texts.en:
Salomatoy is a 56-year-old enterprising village woman. She lives in the Jilikul District with her husband, three sons, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Her husband and sons seasonally grow melons, gourds, and nuts.

Salomatoy is currently preparing to start her own retail business. She is interested in buying and selling fabric. She plans on selling fabric at district markets, working on Thursdays and Sundays. Because Salomatoy does not have enough start-up capital, she is requesting a loan. She sincerely needs this loan. By starting this business, Salomatoy will be able to provide for her family with a stable income that is not dependent on the seasons. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy and resell Tajik fabric for dressmaking.

loans.name: Niño Divino Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socia una de ellas es Julia mujer de 60 años de edad, casada y con tres  hijos, su negocio es la venta de pinol, pinolillo, cajetas, rosquillas actividad que viene realizando desde hace varios años, de ser cliente de la institución tiene 6 años consecutivos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como maíz por quintal, azúcar, cacao, canela, colorantes, saborizantes, etc. Araceli mujer de 36 años de edad su negocio es la venta de pinol, pinolillo, güirilas, yoltamal etc. y Rita tiene 42 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three members, one of which is Julia. Julia is a 60-year-old woman who is married and has three children. For several years, she has run her business selling pinol (a drink made of roasted corn), pinolillo (a drink made from cornmeal and cocoa), caramels, and doughnuts. This is Julia's sixth year as a member of this financial institution. She will invest this loan to buy staple items such as corn in bulk, sugar, cocoa, cinnamon, coloring, and flavoring, etc.

Araceli is a 36-year-old woman who makes a living selling pinol, pilolillo, güirilas (thick corn pancake/tortillas), yoltamal (sweet corn tamales), etc. 
Rita is 42 years old and sells fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy staple items such as corn in bulk, sugar, cocoa, cinnamon, coloring, and flavoring, etc.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirna tiene  41 años de edad, está acompañada con el Sr. Higinio de 40 años de edad, ellos tienen 4 hijos, por quienes se están esforzando para poder sacarlos adelante con el sacrificio de ambos.
Doña Mirna es docente y realiza compra venta de hierro viejo con su esposo, hace  aproximadamente 7 años, desde el año 2.007; ellos obtuvieron este capital para este negocio con la venta de un automóvil, comenzaron a comprar piezas y automóviles chatarras para venderlos en partes, en la actualidad con la ayuda del salario de docente de la Sra. tienen innumerables piezas y es uno de los más concurrido de la zona.
Doña Mirna utilizaría este préstamo para comprar más automóviles chatarra para venderlos en partes, y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Mirna is 41 years old and accompanied by Higinio who is 40 years old. They have four children for whom they are striving to get ahead with each other's sacrifices. Mirna is a teacher. Seven years ago, in 2007, she began buying scrap metal with her husband. They made the money for this business with the sale of an car. They began to buy parts and junk cars to sell them in pieces. With help from her teacher salary, Mirna currently has countless parts and is one of the busiest in the area. Mirna will use this loan to buy more junk cars to sell them in parts. This way she can continue growing.

loans.use: to buy junk cars to sell in parts.

loans.name: Nasim

texts.en:
Nasim is a 47-year-old married lady. She has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Nasim makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan 40,000 PKR, which she will use to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way, she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Nasim wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Maria Petrona

texts.es: Maria, tiene 33 años de edad, es soltera, vive con su madre en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado al comercio, vende almohadas, cojines, forros de muebles y cortinas. Ella compra y vende los productos y los revende en su casa o por pedidos. Ha obtenido varios prestamos para mantener esta actividad, con el actual son 8 ciclos. El préstamo es por 5,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar mas almohadas, forros y cortinas para vender y poder ampliar el negocio. Su plan es mejorar el nivel de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old and single. She lives with her mother in a neighborhood in the town of Choloma, Cortes. From the time she was a young woman, Maria has worked in retail. She sells pillows, cushions, furniture covers, and curtains.

Maria buys and sells her products from her home and by taking orders. She has obtained several loans in order to maintain her business. Maria has had eight loans to date. The loan is in the amount of 5,000 HNL and will be used to buy more pillows, covers, and curtains to sell so that she can expand her business. Her plan is to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more pillows, covers, and curtains to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
El comité llamado Mujeres Alegres está compuesto por señoras que buscan el progreso y bienestar dentro del hogar, todas ellas tienen actividades diferentes es por ello que acuden al grupo para así poder ir mejorando la calidad de vida y bienestar de la familia. 
Se destaca la labor de la Señora Nidia quien es una de las mujeres que siempre busca el bienestar de su familia. Ella se dedica el macate (venta ambulante) de ropas artículos de bazar que vende los fines de semana, es para eso que ella pidió este préstamo para poder comprar invertir en la compra de jeans, remeras, pantalones y demás, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Alegres (Happy Women) consists of women who seek progress and well-being within their households. They all have different business activities. This is why they turn to the group, to be able to continue improving their quality of life and the well-being of their families.

The work of Señora Nidia stands out. She is one of the women who always seeks the well-being of her family. She works as a street vendor, selling articles of clothing and household  items, which she sells on weekends. It is for this reason that she is requesting this loan, to be able to invest in the purchase of jeans, T shirts, pants, and other items, so that in this way she can continue with her sales and striving to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy jeans, T shirts, pants, and other items to sell
